name: Pi-Space Physics Software
short_description:
This is the Official Software of the Pi-Space Physics Theory created by Martin Brady.  I have a B.Sc. in Computer Applications from Dublin City University and I have a keen interest in Physics.

The Theory includes a Quantum Theory of Gravity as well as a reworking of Classical versions of Newton's Formulas. There is a reworking of Navier Stokes which includes Turbulence and a treatment of Fluid Dynamics. Also, the Theory is based on a set of Relativistic Diagrams called Pi-Space Diagrams for those new to the Theory. The Theory is fully Relativistic.


The theory contains a notation for unifying classical physics with relativistic physics. The theory also includes a Quantum theory of Gravity formulation and includes descriptions on the reason for turbulence and aerodynamic lift plus drag.

License :: Creative Commons Attribution License :: Creative Commons Attribution Non-Commercial License V2.0
summary: A Physics Theory for Unifying Classical, Quantum and Relativistic Phys
